title: Hilarious moment playful puppy wakes up his snoring owner by climbing all over his FACE
text:
A puppy was filmed waking up his sleeping owner by climbing all over his face.

The dog, which appears to be a golden retriever, wags his tail excitedly at the start of the 21-second-long video as the man sleeps on the couch.

The clip, filmed in the United States, continues with the person holding the camera zooming in on the snoring man as the puppy starts to climb on top of him.

The pup, which appears to be a baby golden retriever, wags his tail excitedly as his owner sleeps on the couch in the 21-second-long video

The dog places his paw on the man's face and starts climbing - stirring the owner from his nap.

As the pup reaches the man's head, his wagging tail appears to slightly stroke the owner's nose.

The retriever then starts brushing his right hind leg across the owner's face, causing him to scrunch his face as he wakes up as the people behind the camera laugh at the adorable display.
description: The pup, which appears to be a golden retriever, wags his tail excitedly as he climbs all over his owner's face, brushing his hind leg on the sleeping man's cheek in the clip, filmed in the US.
